Room.Name: Hafnia Way/Waterfront Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hafnia Way and Waterfront Way.
Room.LongDescription: Waterfront Way runs east to west, taking people from the western gates surrounding the city, through the farmlands and orchards a couple blocks to the east, all the way to the other side of town. Hafnia Way connects Golden Dolphin Way and Nagaritha Way in order to alleviate some of the traffic congestion on Main Street.
